articles.title: Chris Rock's live Netflix special will film in Baltimore this March in first event of its kind - Baltimore Sun
articles.description: Comedian Chris Rock’s new Netflix special will be a first-of-its-kind event, livestreaming on the platform without edits. And it’s taking place in Baltimore.

articles.title: Ryan Seacrest weighs in on boozy New Year's Eve hosting - Entertainment Weekly News
articles.description: The host says "it's probably a good idea" that CNN decided to restrict libations for anchors on their upcoming New Year's Eve broadcast. "I don't advocate drinking when one is on the air," he tells EW.
articles.content:
